name: Skelly's Quest
description:
Skelly is a skeleton that loves to read, but he just finished his last book.  Go on an adventure to find some new literature for him!

Armed with his trusty Bonerang, Skelly sets out to the Castle Library.

Use his Bonerang to destroy obstacles, jump in midair and activate switches along the way.

Keyboard Controls:

Move - Arrow Keys or WASD

Jump - Space Bar

Throw Boomerang - Left Ctrl or Left Click

Gamepad Controls:

Move - Left Analog Stick

Jump - A

Throw Boomerang - X

Made in 48 hours for the Gamemaker's Toolkit Jam 2019.
